TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示网页内的一个 HTML 元素。

span.span: Represents an HTML element inside of a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 HTML 文档中的元素的任何可能的类型，如`BODY`， `TABLE`，和`FORM`，等等。 represents any possible type of element in an HTML document, such as `BODY`, `TABLE`, and `FORM`, among others. 该类会公开您有望在所有元素上找到的最常见属性。The class exposes the most common properties you can expect to find on all elements. 大多数元素可以拥有*子元素*： 放置在其下其他 HTML 元素。Most elements can have *child elements*: other HTML elements that are placed underneath them. 使用属性来测试是否给定的元素有子级，和要循环访问这些集合。Use the property to test whether a given element has children, and the collection to iterate through them. 属性返回中当前元素嵌套。The property returns the in which the current element is nested. 您通常需要访问属性、 属性和方法不直接公开的基础元素上，如`SRC`特性，可以在`IMG`元素或`Submit`方法`FORM`。You often need access to attributes, properties, and methods on the underlying element that are not directly exposed by , such as the `SRC` attribute on an `IMG` element or the `Submit` method on a `FORM`. 并方法使您检索和修改任何属性或属性上的特定元素，而提供任何方法不会公开中托管的文档对象模型 (DOM) 的访问权限。The and methods enable you to retrieve and alter any attribute or property on a specific element, while provides access to any methods not exposed in the managed Document Object Model (DOM). 如果你的应用程序具有非托管代码权限，则还可以访问未公开的属性和方法与属性。If your application has unmanaged code permission, you can also access unexposed properties and methods with the attribute. 使用要测试一元素是否是特定类型的属性。Use the property to test whether an element is of a specific type. 可以在运行时修改任何 HTML 文档。Any HTML document can be modified at run time. 你可以创建新对象与方法，并将其添加到另一个元素使用或方法。You can create new objects with the method of , and add them to another element using the or methods. 此外可以创建 HTML 标记形式的元素，并将其分配给现有元素的属性。You can also create the elements as HTML tags and assign them to an existing element's property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检查任意 HTML 文档，并派生描述的 HTML 元素，带缩进的字符串和等级编号，用于指示如何深嵌套元素文档中。The following code example shows how to examine an arbitrary HTML document and derive a string describing the HTML elements, with indentation and level numbers used to indicate how deeply nested the elements are in the document. 此代码示例需要您的应用程序主机名为控件`WebBrowser1`。This code example requires that your application hosts a control named `WebBrowser1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 文档对象模型 (DOM)，可更改在多方面的 HTML 文件的运行时内容。The HTML Document Object Model (DOM) enables you to alter the run-time contents of an HTML file in a number of ways. 使用将新元素添加到现有的文档，或将元素移动页上。Use to add new elements to an existing document, or to move an element on the page. 如果某个元素已经有父级，将一个元素追加到另一个元素将从自动删除该元素上一个父级。If an element has already been parented, appending an element to another element will automatically remove that element from its previous parent. 对在运行时使用的文档所做的任何添加调用时将不会持久化方法控件。Any additions made to a document at run-time using will not be persisted when you call the method on the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新的超链接使用方法并将其结束添加页使用的`AppendChild`上`BODY`元素。The following code example creates a new hyperlink using the method and adds it to end of a page using `AppendChild` on the `BODY` element. 该示例需要您的应用程序包含名为控件`WebBrowser1`。The example requires that your application contains a control named `WebBrowser1`. summary.span: 为 HTML 文档对象模型 (DOM) 上的命名事件添加事件处理程序。

span.span: Adds an event handler for a named event on the HTML Document Object Model (DOM).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 管理文档对象模型 (DOM) 公开选择多个事件。The Managed Document Object Model (DOM) exposes only a select number of events. 仅为特定类型的元素，则定义大多数未公开的事件如`submit`事件，仅对有效`FORM`元素。Most of the unexposed events are only defined for specific types of elements; such as the `submit` event, which is valid only on `FORM` elements. 使用将事件处理程序添加到这些未公开的事件。Use to add an event handler to these unexposed events. 文档完成加载之前，不应将事件附加到文档或其中一个对象。You should not attach an event to the document or one of its objects until the document has completed loading. 应调用此方法的最早是在事件的控件。The earliest you should call this method is in the event of the control. 有关可用的非托管事件的详细信息，请参阅[在托管 HTML 文档对象模型访问未公开成员](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/accessing-unexposed-members-on-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md)和 IHTMLElement 接口： [IHTMLElement](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104876)， [IHTMLElement2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104877)， [IHTMLElement3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104878)， [IHTMLElement4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104879)。For more information about the available unmanaged events, see [Accessing Unexposed Members on the Managed HTML Document Object Model](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/accessing-unexposed-members-on-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md) and the IHTMLElement interfaces: [IHTMLElement](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104876), [IHTMLElement2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104877), [IHTMLElement3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104878), [IHTMLElement4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104879).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些元素，如`IMG`和`SCRIPT`，不能具有任何子级。Some elements, such as `IMG` and `SCRIPT`, cannot have any children. 使用此属性，然后再调用或上任意元素。Use this property before you call or on an arbitrary element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例中处理上的事件。The following code example handles the event on . 如果元素不是以前使用的鼠标单击选择，代码会将元素分配给一个名为的私有类变量`MoveElement`。If an element was not previous selected using a mouse click, the code assigns the element to a private class variable named `MoveElement`. 如果选择了一个元素，代码会尝试将其追加到只需单击的元素。If an element was selected, the code attempts to append it to the element that was just clicked. 此代码示例需要您的应用程序主机名为控件`WebBrowser1`，并已添加的事件处理程序上的事件。This code example requires that your application hosts a control named `WebBrowser1`, and that you have already added an event handler for the event on . remarks.format: ## Remarks 许多元素内某一 HTML 文件可以在其下的其他 HTML 元素。Many of the elements inside of an HTML file can have other HTML elements underneath them. 集合提供了用于浏览文档的树形结构的简单机制。The collection provides a simple mechanism for exploring the tree structure of a document. 仅公开其直接父元素是当前元素的元素。 only exposes elements whose direct parent is the current element. 如果有有关`TABLE`元素，将授予你的所有`TR`（行） 元素内的`TABLE`。If you have an for a `TABLE` element, will give you all of the `TR` (row) elements inside of the `TABLE`. 若要检索`TD`内包含的 （单元格） 元素`TR`元素，您将需要使用两种对每个集合`TR`元素或使用集合上的。To retrieve the `TD` (cell) elements contained inside of the `TR` elements, you will need to use either the collection on each individual `TR` element, or use the collection on . 此集合中的元素不保证可按源顺序。Elements in this collection are not guaranteed to be in source order. 如果是`false`，`Children`将始终为空。If is `false`, `Children` will always be empty. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查任意 HTML 文档，并派生描述的元素，带缩进的字符串和等级编号，用于指示如何深嵌套元素文档中。The following code example examines an arbitrary HTML document and derive a string describing the elements, with indentation and level numbers used to indicate how deeply nested the elements are in the document. 这是通过搜索`Children`的所有元素以递归方式，从顶部的文档的 HTML 元素开始的集合。It does this by searching the `Children` collection of all elements recursively, starting with the HTML element at the top of the document. 此代码示例需要您的应用程序具有名为控件`WebBrowser1`。This code example requires that your application has a control named `WebBrowser1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以取消的默认操作通过设置元素上的事件的属性类来`true`。You can cancel the default action for a event on an element by setting the property of the class to `true`. 一个元素上的事件也会在该元素的父元素上并在类本身，除非您设置的属性类到`true`。A event on an element will also occur on that element's parent elements and on the class itself, unless you set the property of the class to `true`. 如果用户单击的元素，不会不当前具有输入焦点事件发生后事件，之前该元素的事件。If the user clicks on an element that does not currently have input focus, the event will occur after the event, but before the event for that element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`HtmlElement1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlElement1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个包装为 Internet 资源管理器文档对象模型 (DOM)，这使用组件对象模型 (COM) 编写的。 is a wrapper for the Internet Explorer Document Object Model (DOM), which is written using the Component Object Model (COM). 如果你需要访问未公开的属性或方法的基础 COM 接口，例如`IHTMLElement`，可以为其使用此对象查询。If you need to access unexposed properties or methods on the underlying COM interfaces, such as `IHTMLElement`, you can use this object to query for them. 若要使用的非托管的接口，您将需要 MSHTML 库 (mshtml.dll) 导入到你的应用程序。In order to use the unmanaged interfaces, you will need to import the MSHTML library (mshtml.dll) into your application. 但是，您还可以执行未公开的属性和方法使用`Invoke`方法。However, you can also execute unexposed properties and methods using the `Invoke` method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用非托管的接口的当前所选的文本并将其转换为超链接，用户选择的 url。The following code example uses unmanaged interfaces to take the currently selected text and convert it into a hyperlink, with the URL chosen by the user. 编写此代码时，窗体具有假设名为控件`WebBrowser1`，且作为对你的项目的引用添加了非托管的 MSHTML 库。This code was written under the assumption that your form has a control named `WebBrowser1`, and that you have added the unmanaged MSHTML library as a reference to your project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有几种方法将新元素添加到现有的 HTML 页面，如和方法。There are several ways to add new elements to an existing HTML page, such as the and methods. 使用通常是添加新内容，必须在新元素上设置多个特性或样式时的最快方法。Using is often the fastest way to add new content when you have to set many attributes or styles on your new elements. 不同于在于将不包括表示正在调用的对象的 HTML。 differs from in that will not include the HTML that represents the object you are calling. 请参阅有关这两个属性之间的差异的详细信息。See for more information about the difference between these two properties. 设置销毁任何以前追加到此元素的子级。Setting destroys any children previously appended to the element. 如果从 DOM 中检索某个元素，然后将新的 html 代码分配给其父级的属性，引用与该元素将无意义，并调用其属性和方法时其行为不确定。If you retrieve an element from the DOM and then assign new HTML to its parents' property, your reference to that element will be useless, and its behavior when it calls its properties and methods is undefined. 对于某些元素，设置不是有效的操作。For some elements, setting is not a valid operation. 一些 HTML 标记有没有结束标记，例如`IMG`标记，并因此不能包含嵌套的元素。Some HTML tags have no closing tag, such as the `IMG` tag, and therefore cannot contain nested elements. 一些标记，如`SCRIPT`标记中，只能包含文本内容; 设置将导致错误。Some tags, such as the `SCRIPT` tag, can only contain text content; setting will result in an error. 两种类型的标记，属性将返回`false`。For both types of tags, the property will return `false`. 但是，您还不能设置上`TABLE`和`TR`元素，作为将 HTML 格式不正确分配到这些元素可能会损坏该文档的呈现。However, you also cannot set on `TABLE` and `TR` elements, as assigning malformed HTML to these elements could corrupt the rendering of the document. 使用或`insertRow`并`insertCell`上的非托管方法`IHTMLTable`界面添加行和单元格到`TABLE`。Use or the `insertRow` and `insertCell` methods on the unmanaged `IHTMLTable` interface to add rows and cells to a `TABLE`. 如果你只需要将文本分配给元素，而不是 HTML 标记，使用属性改为。If you need only to assign text to an element and not HTML markup, use the property instead. 分配到的值将会破坏以前分配使用任何文本值。Assigning a value to will destroy any text values previously assigned using .

## Remarks 元素可将其置于 HTML 页中有以下三种： 默认流定位;相对定位在元素按固定量相对于其父级; 偏移的量和绝对定位，在该元素提供了固定协调文档的相对于左上角位置。Elements can be positioned on an HTML page in one of three ways: default flow positioning; relative positioning, in which the element is offset by a fixed amount relative to its parent; and absolute positioning, in which the element is given a fixed coordinate position relative to the upper-left corner of the document. 当文档的元素使用相对或绝对定位时，您可以使用`OffsetParent`来计算的工作区中的元素的坐标位置。When a document's elements use relative or absolute positioning, you can use `OffsetParent` to calculate an element's coordinate position in the client area. 有关详细信息元素定位在 HTML 中，请参阅[有关元素定位](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533005.aspx)。For more information about element positioning in HTML, see [About Element Positioning](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533005.aspx). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何并对于不同`span1`，`span2`和`span3`:The following code example shows how and differ for `span1`, `span2` and `span3`: ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使发现的元素的上下文。The property enables discovery of an element's context. 最有用的事件处理程序内如，可以激发任何文档的对象层次结构中的任意位置的元素。It is most useful inside of event handlers such as , which can fire for any element anywhere in the document's object hierarchy. 回发到自身的属性的 HTML 元素 （HTML 文档的顶部） 的点。The property of the HTML element (the top of an HTML document) points back to itself. 如果您调用在循环中，验证是否循环的中断条件进行比较的当前元素的类型和类型`Parent`属性，否则你的代码可能执行一个无限循环。If you call inside a loop, verify that the loop's break condition compares the type of the current element and the type of the `Parent` property, or else your code may execute an infinite loop. ## Examples 下面的代码示例查找所有`IMG`在文档中，标记，并使用属性来测试是否`IMG`超链接到另一个页面; 如果是，该代码将分配到的 URL `ALT` 属性`IMG`标记，以便用户可以将鼠标放此图像可查看将在何处获取。The following code example finds all of the `IMG` tags in a document, and uses the property to test whether the `IMG` is hyperlinked to another page; if it is, the code assigns the URL to the `ALT` attribute of the `IMG` tag, so that users can mouse over the image to see where it will take them. remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 文档对象模型 (DOM) 使用样式万维网联盟链级联样式表规范中定义来控制元素的显示。The HTML Document Object Model (DOM) uses styles as defined in the World Wide Web Consortiums Cascading Style Sheets specification to control the display of an element. 在设计样式属性采用分号分隔名称 / 值对，每个对之间用分号，按如下所示：Styles in the property take the form of colon-delimited name-value pairs, with each pair separated by a semicolon, as follows: `style-name1:value1;...;[style-nameN:valueN;]` 若要设置的字体`DIV`到 14 磅 Times New Roman 粗体的元素，例如，您可以分配以下字符串：To set the font for a `DIV` element to 14-point Times New Roman bold, for example, you would assign the following string: `font-face:Times New Roman;font-size:14px;font-weight:bold;` HTML DOM 中的所有可用样式的完整列表，请参阅[样式属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms534651.aspx)。For a full list of all available styles in the HTML DOM, see [STYLE Attribute](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms534651.aspx).
